column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Kate - Thank you for your review. I regret that you did not enjoy your experience at JINYA. Please know that if you're ever dissatisfied with our food for any reason
column3: you inform your server so he or she can replace the item with a new one
column4: offer an alternative or remove it from your tab. As far as seating is concerned
column5: we do try to keep seating fair for all of our guests
column6: as we can never determine if or when our house will fill up unexpectedly
column7: especially now that school is out for the holidays. Though it is my understanding that we were able to move you to a larger table once the server was able to clear it with the host.
